response.overview: An anthology of 10 stories depicting real-life incidents of subway riders in New York City, which range from compassion and love to violence and loss.
response.tagline: Every ride is as unpredictable as the city itself.
response.title: Subway Stories

cast.name: Michael McGlone
cast.character: John T.  (segment "Love on the A Train")

cast.name: Rosie Perez
cast.character: The Girl (segment "Love on the A Train")

cast.name: Carl J. Ferrazza
cast.character: Hot Dog Buyer (segment "Subway Car from Hell")

cast.name: Mekhi Phifer
cast.character: Man in Hallway  (segment "Fern's Heart of Darkness")
